channel.title: Noob Questions
channel.description:
[b]1. How To Change The Text (Im a noob)[/b] [b][[u]Some People Was Tolding me To Change the ''TextHandler'' I Searched Nothing, All Sources The Same, So Wheres The Real One? That Text What Npcs Says. I wanna Change It[/u]/b]
[b][u]2. Change The Text When you logg In[/u][/b]
[b]Like When you login in, In Chatbox Like ''Welcome To SomeScape And Updates say And soo thanks :)[/b]
[b]3.Where I Change The Veng[/b]
[b][u]I Searched Alot And I didnt Find It, What file, Only to change the text When you veng.[/u][/b]
Thanks Guys :)!

item.title: Noob Questions
item.dc:creator: @the_reaper77 the reaper77
item.description:
@the_reaper77 wrote:

I will just explain how to do it nice and easy. Go into your client.java and type Ctrl + F. you will get a box to search. next type in the word of the text you would like to change and search it. then when it brings you to where it says the text just change it.

Read full topic

item.title: Noob Questions

item.description:

That Text What Npcs Says. I wanna Change It/b]

And Updates say And soo thanks
